lines: 1. Tokwan' amang'an' amabeKorw' oromeme rwao;'Nkoro eyarengererieAtararwa omonwa.
"Anchana inwe", Er'otebire;"Bana igw'amachiko a Tata""Anchana inwe", Er'otebire;Abana igw' amachiko.
2. 'Bwanchani obochenu mono,Amo n' obosani bo;'Boriri bw' egek' egeke'Go borasarie bionsi.
3. 'Mang'an' amabe namangoNa ebirengererio;'Kegosaria obosaniRing'an' erimo ribe.
